home.title: Explore Medellín Safely with Expert Security

about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to SafeMedellín, your trusted partner for secure and guided travel experiences in Medellín.

services.title: Our Security & Tour Services
services.description: We provide private security escorts and guided tours to keep you safe while exploring Medellín.
services.private_security_desc: Stay safe with a personal security escort as you explore the city.
services.vip_tours_desc: Experience Medellín’s best locations with a knowledgeable and secure guide.
services.nightlife_security_desc: Enjoy Medellín’s nightlife safely with our security team by your side.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Contact us for bookings, inquiries, or to learn more about our security escort services.
contact.email_desc: Send us an email for business inquiries.
